effect.lv1: Increases the wearer's ATK by 10%, and increases their DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn or Bleed by 16%. This also applies to DoT.
effect.lv2: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%, and increases their DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn or Bleed by 20%. This also applies to DoT.
effect.lv3: Increases the wearer's ATK by 15%, and increases their DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn or Bleed by 24%. This also applies to DoT.
effect.lv4: Increases the wearer's ATK by 17%, and increases their DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn or Bleed by 28%. This also applies to DoT.
effect.lv5: Increases the wearer's ATK by 20%, and increases their DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn or Bleed by 32%. This also applies to DoT.

effect.lv1: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 20%. When the wearer attacks DEF-reduced enemies, regenerates 4 Energy.
effect.lv2: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 25%. When the wearer attacks DEF-reduced enemies, regenerates 5 Energy.
effect.lv3: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 30%. When the wearer attacks DEF-reduced enemies, regenerates 6 Energy.
effect.lv4: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 35%. When the wearer attacks DEF-reduced enemies, regenerates 7 Energy.
effect.lv5: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 40%. When the wearer attacks DEF-reduced enemies, regenerates 8 Energy.
